snippet: Mr. Harding, whose political influence was felt for decades from New York City to Albany as the state’s Liberal Party leader, fell from grace in 2009 after a corruption investigation.
abstract: Raymond B Harding, former leader of New York State's Liberal Party, dies at age 77.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Harding, whose political influence was felt for decades from New York City to Albany as the state’s Liberal Party leader, fell from grace in 2009 after a corruption investigation.

headline.seo: Raymond B. Harding, Ex-Liberal Party Leader, Dies at 77
headline.main: Raymond Harding, 77, Dies; Liberal Party Power Broker
headline.print_headline: Raymond B. Harding, 77, Liberal Party Power Broker, Dies
